---
layout: default
title:  Object in ReScript
date:   2021-03-25
parent: rescript
---

```javascript
// ./Animal.js

let Animal = {}

module.exports = Animal;
```

```rescript
// ./Animal.res

// Object is mutable, with set new property name to animal object.
type animal = {
  @bs.set "name": string
}

@bs.module external animal: animal = "./Animal"

animal["name"] = "Empus";
```

```javascript
// Generated by ReScript, PLEASE EDIT WITH CARE
'use strict';

var Animal = require("./Animal.js");

var animal = Animal;

animal.name = "Pushh";

exports.animal = animal;
/* animal Not a pure module */

```
